entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:06 p.m. EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 18.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 3:00 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 18.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 48 km
Humidity: 33 %
Dewpoint: 2.0°C
Wind: ESE 13 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High 16. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of rain. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
